methods.name: aiStep
javadoc: Called frequently so the entity can update its state every tick as required. For example, zombies and skeletons use this to react to sunlight and start to burn.

methods.name: getBrightness
javadoc: Gets how bright this entity is.

methods.name: isOnFire
javadoc: Returns true if the entity is on fire. Used by render to add the fire effect on rendering.
